post:
I have a HostUS LET special from last month, I was going to use it for a Minecraft server but that's not really in my interests anymore.

There's ~2.5 months left (2 months 13 days exactly, from time of posting)

<code>LET Exclusive Special-1
4 vCPU Cores @ 2.2Ghz Fair Share
6 GB RAM
6 GB vSWAP 
150 GB HW Raid-10 Disk Space
5000 GB Bandwidth
3 x IPv4 Addresses (With Automatic rDNS)
$18 /Quarter</code>

Next due date: 27/06/2014 (June 27th, 2014)

Asking price: $11 USD
